title: Errant IM?
content:
Is there a log I can access to check my sent IMs and who they went to?

I apologize if anyone got a strange IM from me. I meant to send it as a reply to one I received, but I don’t remember if I got the person’s name in the drop-down.

 [‹ normal v book](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805131909/http:/typophile.com/node/19327 "Go to previous forum topic") [Coins and typography-- suggestions? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070805131909/http:/typophile.com/node/19302 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
You sent it to me... (about 20 times)

Nvm though, twas funny.
Sorry, I don’t know how the 20 times thing happened. “Go figure” will have to cover it.
